Original Document.
Changes to 2021 Supplemental Guide for Quarterly Filers:

  • Section 1.1, Institutions Required to File Quarterly
    • Updated to include rescission of policy statement on quarterly reporting
    • Updated Quarters 1-3 filing deadlines, discrete filing periods, & late submission dates to account for new 2021 calendar year and weekend deadlines
  • Section 2.1 Syntactical and Validity Edits
    • Added edit S307
    • Reinstated edits V627 and V716 for quarterly filers
